author.name: Nishitha Kapuluru
author.description:
Nishitha is a Java developer with 6 years of experience in developing web applications using Java technologies across Financial and Networking domains.
She has good experience in application development with technologies like Java 8, Spring boot, Spring MVC, RESTful API and Hibernate.
She is curious to learn new technologies and enjoys sharing her learnings.

author.name: Madan Narra
author.description:
Madan is a software developer, writer, and ex-failed-startup co-founder.
He has over 10+ years of experience building scalable and distributed systems using Java, JavaScript, Node.js. He writes about software design and architecture best practices with Java and is especially passionate about Microservices, API Development, Distributed Applications and Frontend Technologies.
